title: Login Issue
body: When I try to log into my league of legends account, it says "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issues persists please contact support at support.riotgames.com" I can log into any of my other accounts. Please help. My ingame name is Blaz√®. My username is still --snip--. No idea why this has happened.

replies.body: I've removed your username for privacy reasons.  Your password may be incorrect, so resetting that could help!  If not, reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help you directly on this one!
my account password hasn't been changed in years, unless you guys changed it.
Ah yes, sorry for the confusion!  I snipped out your username in your post, you'll want to keep that kind of info safe and secure!

When I go to the account recovery form link, it makes me sign in again, and when I try to log in (all my info is already loaded into the username and password slots because I've just always had it saved) It says the combination and password are not found ?

Indeed, we posted a sticky earlier but incorrect passwords are coming up as an unexpected error.  It's super important you regularly change your password, and it's possible that someone could be trying to gain access to your account.  Your region on the login page could also be incorrect.

See if [resetting your password](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751734-Recovering-Your-Password) is possible for you, otherwise you should be able to use that form without logging in.  Instead, you can input an email address you currently have access to.  If that doesn't work for you, you can also hit us up via support@riotgames.com.

I also highly recommend running through our account protection guide to secure your info in and outside of League!  Don't worry, we can help you out but I want to make sure you get these pieces situated as well.

I don't have access to the email currently on the account. I think somebody has gotten into the account and changed the password. When I try to change the email here: https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect It says wrong password.
